pull.title: rename checkwork
pull.body: not sure if this isupposed to be going one way or the other, so i renamed it to match

events.message:
build: fix 'make distcheck'

Rather than treating the .py as a regular built test, run it from check-local
so that we can better control the paths used.

Adding RPC tests for the following wallet related calls: getbalance,
listsinceblock, listtransactions, listlockunspent, listaccounts
listaddressgroupings

events.body: Is that function used anywhere? The build should break if you just rename it??

The declaration of `CheckWork` is in `miner.h` only. It is not defined at all. See #4603 for more details. The new function `ProcessBlockFound` is used in `miner.cpp` only, and only after its definition, we do not need it there at all... I'd just delete the line.

Merge pull request #5514

be43492 build: fix 'make distcheck' (Cory Fields)

events.body:
ACK

The current defined function in `miner.h` (`bool CheckWork(CBlock* pblock, CWallet& wallet, CReserveKey& reservekey);`) as no implementation because it was renamed in #4603 (but header was not updated).
This PR makes totally sense.

@bitcreditscc Even better would be to completely remove the `CheckWork()` definition in the header.
There is no use outside of miner.cpp.
ok i'll do that however on my own tree i still keep getwork
Good catch, but I went for removal + make static instead, see 269d8ba
